locations.title: Margit the Fell Omen or Morgott the Omen King.
Golden Seed tree along the road from Gatefront to Stormhill Shack.
Crucible Knight in the Stormhill Evergaol.
Deathbird to the east of Warmaster's Shack
Bell Bearing Hunter at Warmaster's Shack
Arrow's Reach Talisman
locations.description: In a chest on a walkway at the top of the Gatefront gate, accessed directly northeast of Stormhill Evergaol

locations.title: Lance Talisman
locations.description: On a corpse resting on rubble on the northeast-most cliffside in Stormhill, north of Saintsbridge and Deathtouched Catacombs
